visibilityRule.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: WARNING: This patient record cannot be used due to missing ICN value. Please create a case by navigating to the Help Desk link.

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: NOTE: The correct Facility CPRS must already be open

componentInstanceProperties.name: vccOwnAccountWarningBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: If you need information from your medical record, please contact your local Health Information Management Service (HIMS) or assigned VA Health Provider.

componentInstanceProperties.name: vccOwnAccountWarningTitle
componentInstanceProperties.value: Security regulations prohibit computer access to your own medical record.
